channel.title: Kubernetes on Nitin Ayyagari
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Nitin Ayyagari

item.title: Building minimal docker images using multi-stage builds
item.description: With the advancements in world of containers, it is now easier and & feasible for you to deploy containerized applications. Docker is a utility to efficiently create, ship, and run containers. They enable isolation and portability of application. However, one of the challenges of building docker images is to hold down the image size. One of the most effective ways to optimise the image sizes is to use multi stage builds.

item.title: Sample
item.description: History Sample Bl√ºdhaven was a former whaling town, which was officially incorporated as a “Commonwealth” in 1912. The town had a generally poor socio-economic populace, owing in part to failed efforts to transform itself into a manufacturing and shipping center.
